Description.Text:
Property Location
With a stay at Mercure Sydney Liverpool in Prestons (Greater Western Sydney), you'll be close to Westfield Liverpool. This 4.5-star hotel is within the region of Liverpool Hospital and Bankstown Golf Club.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 104 air-conditioned rooms featuring private pools and LCD televisions. Your pillowtop bed comes with Egyptian cotton sheets. Cable programming and MP3 docking stations are provided for your entertainment, with wired and wireless Internet access available for a surcharge. Conveniences include phones, as well as safes and desks.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Don’t miss out on recreational opportunities including an outdoor pool and a fitness center. This hotel also features wireless Internet access (surcharge), concierge services, and babysitting/childcare.

Dining
Satisfy your appetite at the hotel's restaurant, which serves breakfast and dinner. Dining is also available at a coffee shop/café, and 24-hour room service is provided. Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include high-speed (wired) Internet access (surcharge), a 24-hour business center, and complimentary newspapers in the lobby. Event facilities at this hotel consist of conference space and meeting rooms. Free self parking is available onsite.


Check-in time starts at 2 PM Check-out time is 10 AM
Satisfy your appetite at the hotel's restaurant, which serves breakfast and dinner. Dining is also available at a coffee shop/café, and 24-hour room service is provided. Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge.
Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.

Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

Westfield Liverpool - 4.6 km / 2.8 mi
Liverpool Hospital - 5 km / 3.1 mi
Bankstown Golf Club - 10.3 km / 6.4 mi
Crest Sporting Complex - 11.3 km / 7.1 mi
Wet'n'Wild Sydney - 13.8 km / 8.6 mi
Sydney Motorsport Park - 14.1 km / 8.8 mi
Westfield Parramatta Shopping Centre - 17.1 km / 10.6 mi
Parramatta Park - 17.1 km / 10.6 mi
Old Government House - 17.2 km / 10.7 mi
Westmead Hospital - 17.4 km / 10.8 mi
Blacktown International Sportspark - 17.5 km / 10.9 mi
Parramatta Stadium - 17.7 km / 11 mi
Elizabeth Farm - 17.8 km / 11 mi
Riverside Theatres - 17.8 km / 11 mi
Parramatta Heritage Centre - 17.8 km / 11.1 mi

The preferred airport for Mercure Sydney Liverpool is Sydney, NSW (SYD-Kingsford Smith Intl.) - 26.8 km / 16.6 mi.

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.

Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.

Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.
